creator_2: Mayfair School of Cosmetic Science and Manufacture ?
physical_appearance: This is a certificate certifying Mrs Chong's completion of a course in Cosmetic Chemistry at Mairfair School of Cosmetic Science and Manufacture. It was signed off by the director and teacher of cosmetic chemistry.
sgcool_label_text: This certificate from Mayfair School of Cosmetic Science and Manufacture was awarded to Mrs Florence Chong (nee Wong Chit Moy) on 6 February 1955. Mrs Florence Chong was the seventh sister of prominent local bridal designer Mrs Sylvia Kho (nee Wong Sien Moy). She received training in make-up and hairstyling in London and provided her services to brides in Singapore as early as the 1950s.
title_text: Certificate from Mayfair School of Cosmetic Science and Manufacture
